reviewText: The DVD is about the construction of the base. Don't expect to see much about the base after construction was complete. That is not what this DVD is about.

I was stationed at Phu Cat from December 1967 - December 1968.  Video DID NOT SHOW any of the base in 1968.
Was disappointed.

Shows very little of the base itself. A lot of staged Security Police action, most of which I have seen on other DVD's of Vietnam. I was stationed at Phu Cat 1968-69, some of the footage does not look like the Phu Cat area. Not worth the price in my opinion.
